sentence.value: He is notable for being one of the only three people in history to die in outer space.

sentence.value: He flew on the Soyuz 11 mission and had the unfortunate distinction of being part of the second Soviet crew to die during a space flight (after Vladimir Mikhaylovich Komarov in Soyuz 1).

sentence.value: After a normal re-entry, the capsule was opened and the crew was found dead.

sentence.value: It was discovered that a valve had opened just prior to leaving orbit that had allowed the capsule's atmosphere to vent away into space, suffocating the crew.
